name: Flower Stamen Ring - Gold Vermeil
description: This beautiful ring in the new collection for Gild the Lily comes in two colors: Silver with yellow gold-plated stamens or Black with pink gold-plated stamens. It's a contemporary take on nature, and so much fun to wear. Price shown in HKD. Silver + yellow ring is currently only available in US Size 6. Black + pink ring is currently only available in US Size 6 + 7. These rings are handmade and will each have their own slight variations. Limited stock available. Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Antique Enamel + Sapphire Flower Double Ring - 18K
description: I came across this lovely antique 18K blue, white and green enamel flower + pink sapphire brooch and decided to customize it into a ring! The pin at the back was removed and replaced with 18K gold textured rings. This ring is meant to be worn on your second and third finger, and is completely unique and one-of-a-kind. The enamel has slight wear due to its age, but it doesn't take away from the piece (and I like to think it gives the ring character). It's an interesting and eye-catching piece! Condition: Slight wear on enamel, gold condition is like new. Price shown in HKD. US size 6.5 and 6. Original antique 18K hallmark stamping can still be seen on the back of the ring. There is only 1 item in stock.

name: Diamond Bow Pendant - 18K
description: This delicate diamond-set 18K bow pendant is the perfect finish to any chain necklace. It is featured here in 18K yellow gold with our 18K yellow gold + pearl chain necklace. This pendant is available in 18K white gold. Chain not included. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. 2.25" X 1.125". Diamond: 0.80ct.

name: Charlotte King Chess Pendant - 18K
description: Make your next move with this 18K gold pendant from our new classic Chess collection. This solid and heavy charm is delicately set with 40 diamonds, and is shown here in 18K yellow gold with a luxurious matte finish. It will be an elegant addition to any of our chain necklaces. Mix and match with our other charms for a truly unique look! This charm is available in 18K white gold. Chain not included. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Pendant measures 1" X 1/4". Weight: 7 grams. Diamond weight: 0.32ct, 40 pcs.

name: White & Black Diamond Zo√´ Rings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's Zo√´ collection is a fun collection that moves and sways with the wearer. This pair of flirty Zo√´ rings are two separate rings, one with white diamonds and one with black diamonds dangling off 18K chain. The chain allows the fringe of diamonds to move and sway when the ring is on your finger. The rings are so much fun to wear and very eye-catching! They can be worn together or separately. Rings are available in US size 5, 6 or 7. For more Zo√´ rings, click here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Set of 2 rings. White Diamonds: 0.20ct, 6 stones. Black Diamonds: 0.20ct, 6 stones. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Art Deco Large Triangle Necklace - Gold Vermeil
description: This Art Deco inspired gold vermeil necklace features clean and simple angles in an oh so charming way. Five gold vermeil graduated triangles set with white sapphires on each corner hangs from silver chain. Yes, gold and silver! This unique two-tone necklace will go well with jeans or a flapper dress. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Centre triangle measures 0.75in X 0.875in. Second triangles (X2) measure 0.5in X 0.625in. Outermost triangles (X2) measure 0.375in X 0.5in. Length of necklace: 26in. White sapphires: 0.65ct, 15 stones. Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Double Chain Necklace + Black Organdy Ribbon - Gold Vermeil
description: This double layered gold vermeil chain necklace with see-through black organdy ribbon is a simple and elegant approach to the everyday necklace. This versatile piece is a fantastic must-have, and will go with practically anything in your closet. 1. Wear it with the ribbon and have two layers of chain elegantly draped down the front and a sweet bow tied on the back of your neck. 2. Bring the bow down to the front next to the chain for a slightly off-kilter look. 3. Take out the ribbon and the two layers of chain become one long chain necklace! (Check out a similar Gild the Lily necklace with taupe ribbon!) You can also interchange the silk ribbon with your own, making it adaptable to different seasons (think of all the colors and materials!). This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Length of chain: 15in. (X 2) Length of ribbon: 50in. Width of ribbon: 3mm. Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Pink & Blue Sapphire Zo√´ Rings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's Zo√´ collection is a fun collection that moves and sways with the wearer. This pair of flirty Zo√´ rings are two separate rings, one with pink sapphires and one with blue sapphires dangling off 18K chain. The chain allows the fringe of sapphires to move and sway when the ring is on your finger. The rings are so much fun to wear and very eye-catching! They can be worn together or separately. Rings are available in US size 5, 6 or 7. For more Zo√´ rings, click here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Set of 2 rings. Pink Sapphires: 0.20ct, 6 stones. Blue Sapphires: 0.20ct, 6 stones. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Double Chain Necklace + Taupe Silk Ribbon - Gold Vermeil
description: This double layered gold vermeil chain necklace with delicate taupe silk ribbon is a simple and elegant approach to the everyday necklace. This versatile piece is a fantastic must-have, and will go with practically anything in your closet. 1. Wear it with the ribbon and have two layers of chain elegantly draped down the front and a sweet bow tied on the back of your neck. 2. Bring the bow down to the front next to the chain for a slightly off-kilter look. 3. Take out the ribbon and the two layers of chain become one long chain necklace! Check out a similar Gild the Lily necklace with black ribbon!) You can also interchange the silk ribbon with your own, making it adaptable to different seasons (think of all the colors and materials!). This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Length of chain: 15in. (X 2) Length of ribbon: 50in. Width of ribbon: 3mm. Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Mexican Bib Necklace - Gold Vermeil
description: I came across this amazing silver necklace in Mexico, brought it home, plated and polished it in 18K gold and voila! A refurbished one-of-a-kind handmade gold vermeil necklace. Six spheres hang within an intricate lace-like framework. Truly special! Condition: Mint. No signs of wear. Clasp closes tightly. Price shown in HKD. Length of necklace: 17in. Lace framework measures 1.5in X 4.5in. Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver. There is only 1 item in stock.

name: Heart & Sword Velvet Ribbon + Chain Necklace - Gold Vermeil
description: This heavy gold vermeil chain necklace with dark blue velvet ribbon was inspired by Gothic Victorian jewelry. An embellished heart and antique shaped sword set with three white sapphires hangs seductively in the middle of the chain. You can wear this necklace by tying the ribbon in varying lengths or wrapping it around your wrist as a bracelet for more of a rocker look. You can also interchange the velvet ribbon with your own ribbons, making it adaptable to different seasons (think of all the colors and materials!). Goth + glamour! This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Heart measures 0.75in X 0.625in. Sword measures 1.5in X 0.625in. White sapphires: 0.12ct, 3 stones. Length of chain: 14in. Length of ribbon: 24in per side. Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Heart & Key Velvet Ribbon + Chain Necklace - Gold Vermeil
description: This heavy gold vermeil chain necklace with black velvet ribbon was inspired by Gothic Victorian jewelry. An antique key and embellished heart adorned with five white sapphires hangs seductively in the middle of the chain. You can wear this necklace by tying the ribbon in varying lengths or wrapping it around your wrist as a bracelet for more of a rocker look. You can also interchange the velvet ribbon with your own ribbons, making it adaptable to different seasons (think of all the colors and materials!). Goth + glamour! This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Heart measures 0.75in X 0.625in. Key measures 1.375in X 0.625in. White sapphires: 0.18ct, 5 stones. Length of chain: 14in. Length of ribbon: 24in per side. Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Constellation Bangle - Gold Vermeil
description: This solid heavy gold vermeil flat bangle has ten white sapphires sprinkled along one corner, like a slice of the sky. A stand out piece that will garner lots of attention! This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Outer diameter: 2.875in. Inner Diameter: 2.375in. Thickness: 2mm. White sapphires: 0.60ct, 10 stones. Matte finish. Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Compass Rose w/ Diamond Necklace - Gold Vermeil
description: If you need a little direction, pick up this delicate and sweet filagree gold vermeil necklace with a dangling compass rose. A precious diamond set in the middle will help shine light on the way. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Filagree measures 1.0in X 1.5in. Compass rose measures 0.75in X 0.625in. Length of chain: 26in. Diamond: 0.03ct, 1 stone. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Harper Nut Rings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Harper' collection. Solid machine-inspired shapes made out of 18K yellow and white gold and diamonds. This set of 3 octagonal "nut" rings comes with one matte white gold ring with 8 diamonds set on the top surface, one polished yellow gold ring with 40+ diamonds set along the octagonal sides, and one polished yellow gold ring with 8 diamonds set on the bottom surface, They are meant to be worn together, but can also be worn separately and in different combinations for versatility. Rings are available in US size 5, 6 or 7. For a slightly different style, take a look at the Harper Washer Rings! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Diamond weight: 0.90ct+, 56+ stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Ribbon Filagree Bracelet - Gold Vermeil
description: This gold vermeil diamond-shaped filagree is delicately secured to the top of your wrist by a sweet silk ribbon bow (adjustable). It's a classic look, and was inspired from vintage ribbon pearl necklaces or chokers. You have a choice of 20" silk ribbon in faded light brown (shown in picture), or organza ribbon in black or light pink. You can interchange with your own ribbons as well! This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. * Please click on "Add Special Request to Merchant" in Paypal's review order page, and type in the ribbon color you prefer. Price shown in HKD. Filagree measures 4.5cm X 2.5cm. Length of ribbon: 22in. Width of ribbon: 3mm. Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Horseshoe with Diamonds - Gold Vermeil
description: This diamond studded horseshoe pendant will bring luck and compliments! A gold vermeil horseshoe pendant set with eight diamonds hangs low on a 30-inch chain. Looks lovely on its own or layered with other long necklaces. *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Horseshoe measures 0.75in X 0.75in. Length of chain: 30in. Diamond weight: 0.10ct, 8 stones. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver

name: Esm√© Earrings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Esm√©' collection. Vintage-inspired 18K diamond studded Esm√© feather earrings. Earring hook has a safety catch for extra protection. name: Vesper Cuff - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The opening of this delicate cuff features the classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif. Easy-to-wear and so lovely to have wrapped around your wrist. (If you want something stackable, check out the Vesper Bangle!) This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Inner diameter of cuff: 5.3cm X 4.5cm. Opening: 2cm. Width of bangle: 0.2cm. Diamond weight: 0.6ct, 8 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Dagger with Diamonds - Gold Vermeil
description: Adding a bit of danger to this collection of sweet Gild the Lily necklaces, this gold vermeil diamond dagger necklace is for girls who might have a naughty streak underneath that delightfully charming demeanor. This necklace is fun to wear when layered alongside something more innocent (such as Gild the Lily's Term of Endearment necklace). The irony will not be lost on people! *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Dagger measures 2.3cm X 0.6cm. Length of chain: 28in. Diamond weight: 0.05ct, 3 stones. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Harper Washer Rings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Harper' collection. Solid machine-inspired shapes made out of 18K yellow and white gold and diamonds. This set of 3 circular "washer" rings comes with one matte white gold ring with 11 diamonds set on the top surface, one matte white gold ring with 50+ diamonds set along the side, and one polished yellow gold ring with 11 diamonds set on the bottom surface, They are meant to be worn together, but can also be worn separately and in different combinations for versatility. Rings are available in US size 5, 6 or 7. For a slightly different style, take a look at the Harper Nut Rings! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Diamond weight: 0.95ct+, 62+ stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Term of Endearment with Diamond - Gold Vermeil
description: Darling! Honey! Sweetheart! Dearest! If you want to give that special someone a personalized and heartfelt gift, this is the perfect necklace to give or receive from a loved one. A special nickname or term of endearment of your choice is engraved on a gold vermeil heart that hangs from a long chain. To make her feel even more loved, a precious diamond hangs next to the heart. Expect to get lots of hugs and kisses! (Check out Gild the Lily's Antique Heart necklace for other gifts from the heart!) *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. * Please click on "Add Special Request to Merchant" in Paypal's review order page, and type in the term of endearment that you would like to engrave on the heart. Standard requests are 'darling', 'honey', 'sweetheart', 'dearest'. Price shown in HKD. Heart measures 1.8cm X 1.6cm. Length of chain: 28in. Diamond weight: 0.03ct, 1 stone. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Magician's Hat with Diamonds - Gold Vermeil
description:
With the wave of a wand, a gold vermeil bunny has popped out of the magician's hat!  This classic-looking bunny is quite happy sitting in a fancy diamond-rimmed hat, and you'll be quite happy wearing it.  The pendant hangs from a unique 30-inch vintage-style chain.  *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces.  Please email for special orders in 10K.

This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production.

Price shown in HKD.  Bunny and hat measures 2.6cm X 1.2cm.  Length of chain: 30in.  Diamond weight: 0.05ct, 7 stones.

Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done!

Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Colette Mesh Necklace - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Colette' collection. 18K yellow gold mesh chain necklace with diamond encrusted leaf clasp and connector. This intricate heavy necklace is the epitome of decadence. Matching bracelet can be found here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Clasp/connector measures 2cm X 0.5cm X 0.5cm. Length of necklace: 17in. Diamond weight: 0.2ct, 24stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Antique Heart with Diamond - Gold Vermeil
description: This vintage-style gold vermeil heart necklace could have come straight out of your grandmother's jewellery box. The heart hangs from a 28-inch double chain, and the fine details on the heart compliments the diamond set in the center. It's a classic necklace that can also be updated when worn with other modern necklaces (such as Gild the Lily's dagger necklace!). *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Heart measures 2cm X 1.7cm. Length of double chain: 28in. Diamond weight: 0.05ct, 1 stone. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Harper Round Escapement Bangle - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Harper' collection. Solid machine-inspired shapes made out of 18K yellow or white gold and diamonds. This round escapement bangle was inspired from the inner workings of a clock, and has 30 diamonds set on the top surface of your choice of matte white gold or polished yellow gold. The bottom surface is plain gold (hole-free), making this a solid and heavy piece. For a slightly different style, take a look at the Harper Edge Escapement Bangle! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Inner diameter of bangle: 6.3cm. Outer diameter of bangle: 7.4cm. Diamond weight: 0.75ct, 30 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Colette Mesh Bracelet - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Colette' collection. 18K yellow gold mesh chain bracelet with diamond encrusted leaf clasp and connector. Delicate and intricate hand-work makes this an heirloom-quality piece to own. Matching necklace can be found here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Clasp/connector measures 2cm X 0.5cm X 0.5cm. Length of bracelet: 6.5in. Diamond weight: 0.2ct, 24 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Clover with Diamond - Gold Vermeil
description: You've just come across a four leaf clover! Lucky you! This gold vermeil lucky clover has a precious diamond set in the middle, making the clover even more valuable. If you want to be extra auspicious, wear this necklace layered with Gild the Lily's Horseshoe necklace! *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown HKD. Clover measures 2.1cm X 2.1cm. Length of chain: 28in. Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Vesper Princess Necklace - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif is decadently repeated on this heirloom-quality necklace. Intricate detail is added with multi-strand chain at the end, and a one-inch extender with a dangling diamond bezel (a CANDICE signature). Perfect for brides-to-be on their wedding day. (Matching bracelet can be found here!) This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Length of necklace: 16in/17in. Diamond weight: 6.35ct, 85 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Colette Cocktail Necklace - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Colette' collection. 18K gold diamond encrusted Colette leaf on a long thin chain. Simple yet stunning. This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Leaf measures: 5.5cm X 1cm. Length of necklace: 28in. Diamond weight: 0.4ct, 16 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Large Leaf with Sapphire Water Drop - Gold Vermeil
description: Picking up and collecting leaves was a favourite childhood pastime, and this gold vermeil leaf with a dangling sapphire water drop is my ode to those memories. It is sure to catch the eye of other nature-lovers! The leaf is moveable along the chain. (If you're interested in other leaf necklaces, check out Gild the Lily's Cascading Leaves necklace!) *Small heart tag is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Leaf measures 4.2cm X 4.4cm. Length of chain: 28in. Sapphire weight: 0.9ct (color and carat weight will vary for each necklace), 1 stone. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Colette Earrings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Colette' collection. Dramatic 18K gold mesh chain dangling earrings with the signature Colette diamond encrusted leaf. This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Leaf connector measures 2cm X 0.5cm X 0.5cm. Length of earrings: 3.5in. Diamond weight: 0.2ct, 24 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Esm√© Bracelet - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Esm√©' collection. Vintage-inspired 18K diamond studded Esm√© feather on a unique twist chain. Length of bracelet is 6.5 inches, but can be lengthened by a half-inch extender with a dangling diamond bezel (a CANDICE signature). Matching necklace can be found here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Feather measures 3cm X 1.1cm. Length of necklace: 6.5in/7in. Diamond weight: 0.23ct, 20 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Vesper Solitaire Necklace - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif hangs in the middle of this multi-strand necklace. Length of necklace is 16 inches, but can be lengthened by a one-inch extender with a dangling diamond bezel (a CANDICE signature). Matching bracelet can be found here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Length of necklace: 16in/17in. Diamond weight: 0.35ct, 5 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Vesper Solitaire Bracelet - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif is centered on this multi-strand bracelet. Length of bracelet is 6.5 inches, but can be lengthened by a half-inch extender with a dangling diamond bezel (a CANDICE signature). Matching necklace can be found here! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Length of bracelet: 6.5in/7in. Diamond weight: 0.33ct, 5 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Harper Edge Escapement Bangle - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Harper' collection. Solid machine-inspired shapes made out of 18K yellow or white gold and diamonds. This edge escapement bangle was inspired from the inner workings of a clock, and has 18 diamonds set on the top surface of your choice of matte white gold or polished yellow gold. The bottom surface is plain gold (hole-free), making this a solid and heavy piece. For a slightly different style, take a look at the Harper Round Escapement Bangle! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. * Please click on "Add Special Request to Merchant" in Paypal's review order page, and type in "white gold" or "yellow gold". Price shown in HKD. Inner diameter of bangle: 6.3cm. Outer diameter of bangle: 7.4cm. Diamond weight: 0.45ct, 18 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Vesper Opera Necklace - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. A lavish 18K mesh chain opera-length necklace interspersed with eight classic Vesper diamond motifs. Two different weights of chain are used for subtle detail. This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Length of necklace: 34.5in. Diamond weight: 2.4ct, 32 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Vesper Dangling Earrings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif is featured with a dangling tassle of chain in this pair of elegant and dynamic earrings. Earring hook has a safety catch for extra protection. (Looking for something more simple? Check out the Vesper Stud Earrings!) This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Length of earrings: 3.5in. Diamond weight: 0.6ct, 8 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Esm√© Tiered Necklace - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Esm√©' collection. Dramatic five-tiered necklace featuring two 18K diamond studded Esm√© feathers on unique twist chain. Length of necklace is 19 inches, but can be lengthened by a one-inch extender with a dangling diamond bezel (a CANDICE signature). This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Feather measures 3cm X 1.1cm. Length of necklace: 19in/20in. Diamond weight: 0.45ct, 39 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Antique Filagree with Diamond - Gold Vermeil
description: Hanging from a long delicate lacy chain, this vintage-style gold vermeil filagree exudes old-world elegance. The necklace is made even more precious with the diamond set in the center of the intricate filagree. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Filagree measures 2.5cm X 1.8cm. Length of chain: 30in. Diamond weight: 0.05ct, 1 stone. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver. Please email for special orders in 10K.

name: Vesper Stud Earrings - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. Subtle elegance is achieved with this pair of classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif stud earrings. Special butterfly catch (catch needs to be pressed in order to be removed from backing) is used for extra protection. If you're looking for something more dramatic, check out the Vesper Dangling Earrings! This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Diamond weight: 0.6ct, 8 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Key with Diamonds - Gold Vermeil
description: This gold vermeil antique key unlocks an old jewellery box filled with treasures, a hidden door, a secret garden, someone's heart... It's completely up to your imagination! Unlike other Gild the Lily necklaces, the key pendant is meant to be worn hanging straight on your side instead of hanging down at the bottom of the chain, as the key has been set along the chain. Two diamonds are embedded in the key. *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Key measures 2cm X 0.9cm. Length of necklace: 30in. Diamond weight: 0.035ct, 2 stones. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.

name: Vesper Bangle - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif is featured on this simple and elegant stackable bangle. (Another option is the Vesper Cuff!) This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Inside diameter of bangle: 6cm. Width of bangle: 0.2cm. Diamond weight: 0.3ct, 4 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Bow with Diamond - Gold Vermeil
description: Sweet with a little glamour! This gold vermeil bow is set with a precious diamond, and hangs from chain that has been doubled up for more texture. If you're wearing a backless top or dress for a night out, this necklace can be worn with the bow behind your neck and the double bead chain hanging in front. This sweet necklace suddenly turns sexy! This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Bow measures 0.75in X 0.75in. Length of double chain: 30in. Diamond weight: 0.05ct, 1 stone. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold vermeil: 18K gold plated silver. Please email for special orders in 10K.

name: Vesper Ring - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif ring. This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. *Available in US ring size 5, 6 or 7. Please type in requested ring size at the Paypal review order page, after clicking 'Add Special Request to Merchant'. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Ring size: US 5, 6 or 7. Width of band: 0.2cm. Diamond weight: 0.3ct, 4 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Vesper Princess Bracelet - 18K
description: CANDICE fine jewellery's 'Vesper' collection. The classic 18K Vesper four-diamond motif is decadently repeated on this heirloom-quality bracelet. Intricate detail is added with multi-strand chain at the end, and a half-inch extender with a dangling diamond bezel (a CANDICE signature). Perfect for brides-to-be on their wedding day. (Matching necklace can be found here!) This item is made-to-order and requires 2-3 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Vesper motif measures 1cm X 0.7cm X 0.2cm. Length of necklace: 6.5in/7in. Diamond weight: 2.13ct, 29 stones. Diamond quality: G-H color / SI clarity. Also available at Lane Crawford Pacific Place, Hong Kong.

name: Cascading Leaves - Gold Vermeil
description: Like three delicate leaves falling to the ground, this necklace features three cascading gold vermeil leaves with three tiers of chain. There's no need for extra layering with this necklace... it stands out on its own! (If you're interested in other leaf necklaces, check out Gild the Lily's Large Leaf necklace!) This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Leaf measures 3cm X 1.2cm. Length of necklace: 30.25in. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver. Please email for special orders in 10K gold.

name: Antique Filagree and Dagger - Gold Vermeil
description: * featured in New York Magazine! Interesting, unusual, eye-catching. This necklace is for the individual who likes to be distinct yet subtle. A gold vermeil dagger hangs like an amulet from three separate chains attached to an antique-style filagree. *Small heart tag pictured next to pendant is only available on 10K gold necklaces. Please email for special orders in 10K. This item is made-to-order and requires 2 weeks for production. Price shown in HKD. Filagree measures 1.3cm X 2.7cm. Dagger measures 2.2cm X 0.7cm. Length of necklace: 32in. Please note that there are no clasps on the long necklaces from Gild the Lily, making it very easy to wear... just slip it on over your head and you're done! Gold Vermeil: 18K gold plated silver.
